mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCTLIST_NO, RECIPE_NO, RECIPE_NAME, RECIPE_IMG, SALES_COUNT, VIEW_NO, RK FROM (SELECT PRODUCTLIST_NO, RECIPE_NO, RECIPE_NAME, RECIPE_IMG, SALES_COUNT, VIEW_NO, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY VIEW_NO DESC) AS RK FROM PRODUCTLIST) WHERE RK <= 5
